revision.text:
==[[Roaming Pokemon]] Farm Setup== Trying to attract a Roaming Pokemon? The [[Jaboca]] berry can help boost your roaming encounter chances, and Lum can help boost those odds further. See the [[Roaming Pokemon]] page for more detailed odds. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ '''''Roaming Pokemon Chance: 2.54x''''' |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 20%;" | [[File:Jaboca.png|30px]]
